term.title: mustards

item.text: Compounds having two β-haloalkyl groups bound to a sulfur atom, as in (XC2H2C2H2)2S, and their analogues, the nitrogen (and phosphorus) mustards, (XC2H2C2H2)2NR. Compounds having one β-haloalkyl group and one β-hydroxyalkyl group on S are termed hemi- or semi-mustards by some chemists.
